useCase.name: Update Profile Information
useCase.trigger: Buyer initiates a request to update their profile information.

mainSequence.step: Buyer updates their profile information through the UI.
UI sends a PUT request to the Web server to update the user profile.
Web server validates and saves the profile changes received from the UI.
App server updates the user profile data in the database.
App server receives acknowledgment from the database after updating the user profile.
App server notifies the Web server of the successful profile update.
Web server informs the UI of the successful profile update.
UI confirms to the Buyer that the profile has been updated successfully.
